Richard Johnson, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Tweedy Bird Loc, bụ onye America na-eti egwu
Johnson na ónyé na-emepụta Ronnie M
Phillips haziri ọrụ hip hop Bloods & Crips, mmekorita n'etiti ndị otu Bloods na Crips nké dị na California. Johnson bụ Crip n'onwe ya, nke jikọtara ya na Kelly Park Compton set.
Tweedy Bird Loc, site n'enyemaka nke Ronnie Phillips, malitere idekọ abọm izizi ya 187 Ride By na 1992

Ọ ka na Eazy-E na-alụ ọgụ n'oge ahụ; mgbè Tweedy Bird Loc nụrụ Eazy n'ajụjụ ọnụ na-ekwu na ọ gaghị abịanye Tweedy Bird loc na Ruthless, Tweedy chèrè na a naghị akwanyere ya ùgwù nke ukwuu ya mèrè ya na ndị rap ibe ya Big D Mark, Nini X na Notorious Joe dere egwu ọjọọ nke e mere maka Eazy na ónyé njikwa ya Jerry Heller, na onye na-akwado ya akpọrọ "Hoe bụ Bitch" nke ọ dị mkpà na-emetụta Eazy
Tweedy Bird Loc na-akparị ndị otu hip hop niile H.W.A
bụ ndị ha na Eazy nwèrè njikọ n'oge ahụ
Tweedy Bird Loc malitere ịrụ ọrụ na abọm nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ ya, No Holds Barred na 1994
[citation needed] Abọm ahụ wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ ya "Walk That Walk"
[citation mkpa] Abọmpi a nwèrè  ịga nke ọma karịa '187 Ride By' album ya gárá aga
[citation chọrọ] Tweedy nwekwara ajụjụ ọnụ telivishọn site na Compton
